title: Wordimagesoundplay - Rare 2004 experimental game for PS2 (new up
description:
Hello fellow collectors and adventurers. You'll find here a new torrent for this Japan only limited release (4k units) 

experimental trip made by the English studio Tomato and silently published by Sony Music Entertainment Japan on March 10th of 

2004.

The previous upload made in 2008 is long dry and I've lost the original files since then, hence this new torrent.

_________


The files are just one plain 1:1 image. 
Nothing stripped or modified from the original data. 

_________


Description:

wordimagesoundplay is a music experience "game" for the PlayStation2. The title features music from Underworld and Tomato.


The software is made up of four main parts:


Miracles & Wonders
A mysterious story is told in a three-dimensional space, which can be traversed  infinitely. The music is a collection of 

remixed Underworld tracks, lasting more than 20 minutes.


Sleeping eye
Find the hidden links between 15 different compositions. 

Graphics and sound provided by Tomato.


LatLongStories
Two separate stories are told on the screen, one vertically, and one horizontally (representing latitude and longitude). 

The stories merge together and the intersection becomes a hyperlink.


Phonology
Eight people appear on the screen and each one can be used as a channel of sound. The people are all members of Tomato, 

performing strange actions while a sound is played. This creates amusing visuals with a surreal soundtrack.

(From PlayAsia)

_________

Wordimagesoundplay 
Tomato
NTSC-J /XSPL 65484 (SLPM 65844)
